name: ProjectOmega v0.1
description:
Project Omega

This is an Early Alpha of my game, still working in it. 

This is a Debug and controler test, there's still much to be done (mainly working with the present bugs) but it's able to show what I'm developing.

Recomend using a controller, this way it's possible to have a better game experience (the controlers are still on test so the buttons are kinda weird on keyboard).

The game will be 2d pixel art, with platformer and rpg elements. Souls like inspired mechanics and such. 

This is my first project so please leave a feedback, it will help me so much. Thank you.

If you are interessed in the C# scripts for the movements and such fell free to visit:

JpBaraky/ProjectOmega(github.com) 

Controls
Arrows - Move

 Space Bar - Jump

Enter - Bow&Arrow

Shift - Dodge Roll

Ctrl - Swing axe
